Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Includes information on congenital heart defect births in the informational leaflets required to be given to maternity patients
Summary: Includes information on congenital heart defect births in the informational leaflets required to be given to maternity patients by hospitals and birth centers.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-j, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including information on congenital heart defect births in the informational leaflets required to be given to maternity patients
